repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

summary.p:
A multi-text manuscript containing:
An additional title page announcing the Pirayōkavivēkam, but not related to the content of the bundle.
The Akapporuḷ Viḷakkam, preceded by 3 satellite stanzas (U3a).
The Puṟapporuḷ Veṇpāmālai (U3b).
The Taṇṭiyalaṅkāram (U3c).
The Veṇpāppāṭṭiyal (U3d).
Description by Thillai Chidambaram Rajarethinam based on the examination of the original manuscript (April 2019).

supportDesc.foliation: Two parallel and discontinuous left-marginal Tamil numerals foliation (U3): Tamil foliation 161-180, 184-192 above Tamil foliation 56-75, 79-87.

collation.desc: 1 folio = Title Page (additional). No foliation. Verso blank. 310 x 40 mm.
1 folio = guard leaf. No foliation. Blank recto verso. 310 x 40 mm.
29 folios. Tamil foliation 56-75, 79-87. Parallel Tamil foliation 161-180, 184-192. f87v = f192v blank. 310 x 40 mm.
11 folios = Akapporuḷ Viḷakkam. Tamil foliation 56-6[6] = Parallel Tamil foliation 161-171.
9 folios = Puṟapporuḷ Veṇpāmālai. Tamil foliation 67-75 = Parallel Tamil foliation 172-180.
4 folios = Taṇṭiyalaṅkāram. Tamil foliation 79-82 = Parallel Tamil foliation 184-187.
5 folios = Veṇpāppāṭṭiyal. Tamil foliation 83-87 = Parallel Tamil foliation 188-192. f87v = f192v blank.

supportDesc.condition: Good state of preservation, despite boreholes.

additions.desc: Current BnF shelfmark sticker, covering an older sticker: INDIEN 187 (front cover, recto).
BnF donation sticker DON N° (front cover, recto).

Total cūttirams table (no title; 1 column): chapter's name, followed by its total cūttirams; overall total cūttirams. Note that the table is given right after the end of the text on the same page (not, as usual, on its own page). By the original copyist. See details below.

binding.p: Pinewood covers apparently fabricated in the BnF. 315 x 40 mm. 3 stringholes for U1 (reused folio): one stringhole punched to fit the bundle.

origin.origDate: Not internal date. Dated to circa 1750 by Vinson in Vinson et al. (1866-) and to 1750 by Cabaton (1912), on unstated grounds (presumably palaeographical and material analysis arguments). It is possible that description by Vinson and Cabaton does not apply to this bundle. Not after 1854, since part of the collection of Édouard Ariel (1818-1854), bequeathed in 1855 to the Société Asiatique, Paris (Rosny 1868).

provenance.p: Owned by Édouard Ariel (1818-1854). Bequeathed by Édouard Ariel to Société Asiatique (Rosny 1868, p. 177).

acquisition.p: Received, August 1st, 1866, from the Société Asiatique. — See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 7 = Dons: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1848-1895, no. 1192.

listBibl.bibl: Cabaton, Antoine. 1912. Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois & malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 31, no. 187.

D'Avella, Victor B. 2020. Orbiting Material in Tamil Grammatical Texts, in Colophons, Prefaces, Satellite Stanzas edited by Eva Wilden and Suganya Anandakichenin, pp. 223-280. Hamburg: Department of Indian and Tibetan Studies, Universität Hamburg (Indian and Tibetan Studies 10). — This manuscript is described pp. 241-242.
Rosny, Léon de. 1868. La bibliothèque tamoule de M. Ariel, de Pondichéry. In Variétés orientales, 177‒224. Paris: Maisonneuve.
Vinson, Julien & Feer, Léon & s.n. 1866-. Catalogue des manuscrits tamoul et télinga. Manuscript, BnF Indien 577. — See f. 46r, no. 187.

encodingDesc.p: General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.

revisionDesc.change: Encoded and revised by Emmanuel FRANCIS. Version 1, July 2022.
Updated by Emmanuel FRANCIS. Version 2, March 2023.

body.ab:
hariḥ
Om naṉṟāka
Akapporuḷ
Eṇṇiya veṇṇiya veytuva kaṇṇutaṟ
pavaḷa mālvarai payanta
kavaḻa yāṉaiyiṉ kaḻalpaṇi vōrē
tavaḷat tāmarait tāt' ār kōyi
l avaḷai
p pōṟṟutum arun tamiḻ kuṟittē
cantaṉap potiyat taṭavaraic centamiḻp
paramācariyaṉ pataṅkaḷ
cira mēṟ koḷḷutun tikaḻtaraṟ poruṭ
poṭa pūmali nāvaṉ māmalaic ceṉṉi yīṇṭiya vimaiyōr vēṇṭaliṟ pōntu
ciṟappuppāyiram muṟṟum malartalai yulakattup pulavō
rāynta varuntamiḻakapporuḷ kaikkiḷai yaintiṇai peruntiṇaiyeṉa veḻupeṟṟittākum · 1 ·
Iraṇṭāvatu kaḷaviyal

ṟum Uḷamalikātal
mūṉṟāvatu varaiviyal

nāṉkāvatu kaṟpiyal
· 29 · mūṉṟāvatu varaiviyaṉ muṟṟum poṟpaṉ
Aintāvatoḻipiyal
· 10 · nāṉkāvatu kaṟpiyaṉ muṟṟum Oḻipeṉap paṭuva takappāṭṭuṟuppuvaḻuviṉamatiyun
· 46 · Akapporuḷ viḷakkamuṟṟum
Akattiṇaiyiyal 116
kaḷaviyal 53
varaiviyal 28
kaṟpiyal 10
Aintāvatoḻipiyal 49
{Āka}c cūttiram 253the number 200 was first written as a conjunct of 2 and 100, then rewritten, below the line, with the the ghyphs clearly separated

ab.seg:
maṉṉiya ciṟappiṉ vāṉōrvēṇṭa teṉmalai irunta cīrcāl muṉivaṉṟaṉpāṟ ṟaṇṭamiḻ tāviṉṟuṇarnta tuṉṉaruñ cīrtti tolkāppiya
ṉ mutaṟ paṉṉiru pulavarum pāṅkuṟap pakarnta paṉṉiru paṭalamum paḻippiṉṟuṇarn tōṉōṅkiya ciṟappi ṉulaka muḻutāṇṭa vāṅkuviṟ ṟaṭakkai
vāṉavar marumā ṉaiyaṉāritaṉ kaliṭattavarkku maiyaṟu puṟapporuḷ vaḻāliṉṟu viḷaṅka veṇpāmālai yeṉap peyar niṟīip paṇpuṟa mo
ḻintaṉṉa pāṉmaiyiṟ terintē Etu pāyiram veṭci veṭciyaravam

body.ab:
hariḥ Om
Alaṅkāram potuviyal
colliṉ kiḻatti melliyaliṇaiyaṭi cintai vaittiyampuval ceyyuṭkaṇiyē · 1 · ceyyuḷeṉpavai terivuṟa virippiṉ muttakaṅ kuḷakan to
kai toṭarnilaiyeṉa vettiṟattaṉavum īriraṇṭākum · 2 ·
Iraṇṭāvatu poruḷaṇiyiyal
· 1 · Evvakaipporuḷum meyvakai viḷakkuñ coṉmuṟai toṭuppatu taṉmaiyākum · 2 ·
mūṉṟāvatu collaṇiyiyal
· 64 · Iraṇṭāvatu poruḷaṇiyiyal muṟṟum kumaraṉ tuṇai
Eḻuttiṉ kūṭṭa miṭai piṟitiṉṟiyum peyarttum vēṟuporuṭariṉ maṭakkē · 1 ·
mūṉṟāvatu
nāṉkāvat' oḻipiyal
28 · nāṉkātoḻipiyaṉ muṟṟum · Alaṅkāra nūṉ muṭivu cūttira nūṟṟirupattāṟu muṭintatu muṟṟum
